entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Shawinigan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:20 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Shawinigan 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -9.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 78 %
Dewpoint: -13.0°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
